alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 09 at 2:45AM MST until December 09 at 4:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Wasatch Mountains I-80 North. * WHEN...From 5 AM to 4 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Accumulating snow will result in winter driving conditions across mountain routes during the day Friday, particularly through Logan and Sardine Canyons.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
